website_summaries.verdict: Every budding doctor needs quality tools and a good doctor's bag for routine check-ups, and you'll find both in this sparkly little set.
pros: Comes with all the must-have tools of the trade, including a sound and light stethoscope, thermometer, blood pressure cuff and working gauge, otoscope, syringe, bandage cuff bracelet, bandage stickers, and doctor's bag
cons: Sparkles can come off a bit too easily
Younger kids might need to practice opening and closing the bag

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY WHY DID NOT ONE MENTION SPARKLES!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews on this before I bought it no one mentions the Sparkles that go everywhere and are a danger to a small child! opened this and in 5 min...the child's hand and face and clothes and everywhere Sparkles and very close to her eyes god forbid one got in there or could and I did not notice but all over, the mom called me next day said she was still finding sparkles these things are harmful how does a toy like this get on the market???
customer_reviews.author: Bart S.

customer_reviews.title: Picture is Deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Beware - the thermometer in the picture is not included. My daughter has played with this at her older cousin's house and loved pretending to take everyone's temperature. I thought I would get one for her - because what a great gift?! Wrong.. We were pretty disappointed. It did come with stickers though - which is not even a comparable replacement. I'm only giving it one star because I believe that the item you see and purchase should be the item you receive.
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough but not as shown
customer_reviews.text: The parts you get are cute, but this product is not as shown. Instead of the thermometer you get a sheet of stickers, which hardly seems like a fair trade. The doctor bag is very hard for kids to open and the opening is small enough that it’s hard to remove things from it. Also, my kid was disappointed the stethoscope makes noise but doesn’t make heartbeat sounds. It says “let’s check your heart” and “this won’t hurt a bit” instead. The rest of the parts are nice and the set is cute, but it’s dosappuntkng what you see on the listing is not what you get.
customer_reviews.author: lovestoshop

customer_reviews.title: Missing thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to open it, I didn’t realize the thermometer was missing. Literally everything in the display picture but the thermostat. Didn’t read the reviews. Went off pic. It’s packaged correctly. The box I received said 7 pieces. Company selling a different model than advertised. She’s 2 and a half and has difficulty opening the carry case. For less than $10 and 2 day shipping, I can’t complain. It also has Doc Mcstuffins recorded sayings. Still a cute set. Average rating. Not perfect and not the worst thing ever.
customer_reviews.author: BxNy

customer_reviews.title: Kit has everything
customer_reviews.text: My almost three year old granddaughter loved this set. She played with it all day. It has a talking stethoscope, a plastic band aid bracelet, a syinge with a pump to give a shot, a otoscope to look in your ear, a blood pressure cuff with a pump up dial and stickers to give out after your checkup. It all comes in it's own Doctor McStuffins sturdy plastic doctor box with a carry handle. Everything is pink and very girly. She absolutely loved this and played with it all day giving Nana and Paw Paw checkups. It was an add on item and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Angelgirl

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: In the product display of the parts included online, it displays what appears to be a thermometer, but there was no thermometer in the package. It's actually displayed on the doctor's bag illustration as well. Additionally, it's a bit disappointing that the the stethoscope doesn't at least have a faux heartbeat sound; the other sounds are nice, but it would seem that a heartbeat sound would be necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M. Carr

customer_reviews.title: This is a ripoff
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item and was totally ripped off. I purchased this toy specifically for the blood pressure cuff and the stethoscope as my daughter had lost hers from a pervious set. This set came with only 3 pieces a flimsy hoĺlow stethoscope that didnot light or play any sounds, no blood pressure cuff or otoscope as advertised. This was a total disppointment and deserved no star at all
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Muschette

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves doc mcstuffins, and she loves this doctor bag! Almost 2 months later she is still giving checkups daily. The little accessories and the case have held up nicely. The case was a little tricky for her to figure out, but after showing her a few times she is now able to open and close it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L

customer_reviews.title: The box doesn't open very far
customer_reviews.text: My little one jumps at the chance to "help" you feel better. The toys are durable and have held up well in the last 3 months of use. We don't like the container, however because it does not open very far frustrating her since she can't see everything inside and it's hard to put larger items in so we don't use it but decorated a shoe box and she's happier.
customer_reviews.author: JTW

customer_reviews.title: There are a few reasons this is on sale!!!
customer_reviews.text: The price caught my eye but don’t let that fool you too. The bag is very hard to open, especially for a kid. It’s hard plastic and has to be clicked into place correctly for it to open and shut. No thermometer. They replaced it with stickers. Stupid. Some of the pieces have glitter on them and it gets everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doc McStuffins fan
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Doc McStuffins. So we used this as a potty training reward. She opened it with joy and loves it. There is one design flaw. She is younger (3 years old) so doesn't fully understand how everything works (especially keeping clear of pinch points). She has had it for 2 days and pinched herself shutting the lid several times. Maybe a design flaw for those that are super young? Also, like many have noted, no thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Goofbot

customer_reviews.title: It Was Ok
customer_reviews.text: I have twin daughters who new 2, I bought this version and the newer version for them for christmas. I wanted them to have some variety! The contents were perfect my girls love all of the doctor pieces, and it also comes with things the new one doesn't. Only for a two year old it was a bit to difficult for them to open without help...the top has to pop off, and it breaks way to easily. The new bag design is wayyyyy better.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Change the stock photo, already!
customer_reviews.text: They really need to change the stock photo as they’ve obviously changed the kit YEARS ago now and it does not/not come with a thermometer. My daughter didn’t know what she was missing until she happened to see the stock photo on my phone that I’d sent my husband, ugh. So now I’m on here trying to find a toy thermometer because “doctors always take your temperature.” Cute enough kit, although the doctor’s bag did boggle us for a few moments when we first opened the package - it’s not super intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new doctor bag! Like others said, she does have trouble opening and closing it fully but I don't mind helping her at all. Her set came with 5 pieces and she's very happy with them all, the quality is great and I'm glad that I was able to get it on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a while!
customer_reviews.text: The is an extreme cute doctor set. We bought it as a Passover gift for our little gems. For the first 48 hours we didn’t even see them as they were so enthralled with the set! It comes with a stethoscope, ear checked , bliss pressure and bandage. It really makes playing going to the doc seem real! Only downside is they stopped playing with it! I guess the excitement only lasts so long. Another downside is the holder which stores all the doctor toys is difficult to open on their own.
customer_reviews.author: laya k.

customer_reviews.title: Doc McStuffin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my 3 year old grandaughter who is a fan of Doc McStuffin. She is thrilled with it. Me,on the other hand, was somewhat disappointed. The doctor case is very narrow, barely big enough to hold the "implements". Also, the case is very difficult to open. I do admit the stethoscope is cute with all its sounds and the time spent examined is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Kids like it
customer_reviews.text: Great sale price. I bought it for my 2 year old granddaughter and she likes it, but my 4 year old grandson loves it. Every night I get a check up. Well made. The older one can open on his own, but it is tight.
customer_reviews.author: realReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy set! My 5 year old and 2 year old play w this set every day since we got it. It’s adorable and the case is pretty sturdy. The dr kit and tools are well made w a thicker plastic to last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for future docs
customer_reviews.text: My (about to be) 3 year old granddaughter loves to play doctor with her dolls and stuffed animals so I got this for her for Christmas. It's much prettier in person and she absolutely loves it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Karyl K

customer_reviews.title: The carrying case is to hard for my 3 yrs old granddaughter to open and breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this doctor kit for my 3 yr old granddaughter and she couldn't open it. Every time she went to play with it either her mother or I had to open it. Also the top kept falling off and we had to put it back on and we had a very hard time to get it back on to close the case. Eventially the little plastic piece that keeps the top closed broke off. Within 3 days the case broke. Not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Chapell

customer_reviews.title: Its a hit
customer_reviews.text: Overall a hit! I wish the bag was easier top open. My 3-yr-old struggled with that. Now she's got a good technique that involves holding it down with her knee. In spite of this, she loves it! Her toys and parents have gotten so. many. checkups. There are other sets that are cheaper and have more components (we also got a generic set) and the quality is very similar. If I was not really aiming to specifically match the show, the generic set would be a better buy for sure... but my kid really likes the show so I put a high value on visually matching Doc.
customer_reviews.author: Ivory

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our 2.5 year old niece who is obsessed with playing doctor, and this has only perpetuated the obsession. She LOVES it and walks around making everyone be her patient (including the dog), checking heart beats and applying the ‘band aid’. Great quality and has all of the ‘equipment’ you’d expect in a doctor’s kit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kind of cute, kind of unsafe
customer_reviews.text: Took off a star because the actual carrying case isn’t very child friendly. My daughter can barely get her hand into it and it scrapes her skin. I can’t even maneuver my hands it it. The toys are sturdy and haven’t broken but the carrying case is really disappointing and a little dangerous
customer_reviews.author: DearCharys

customer_reviews.title: Beware!! there are 2 Versions out there and some sellers (KING TOYS) are selling cheap one for the high end price.
customer_reviews.text: This kit SHOULD come with "Doc's bag, play thermometer, syringe, blood pressure cuff, otoscope, bandage cuff, sticker sheet and Doc's magical light up stethoscope" The kit that was delivered to me didn't have the thermometer, blood pressure cuff or otoscope. On top of that, the stethoscope doesn't light up. When I contacted Amazon, they said they can't do anything since it was sold by KING TOYS. They offered me 30% off or I could return it. Based on the other bad reviews of this "cheap" version, I'm returning it. BEWARE!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Random

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting Toy
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this toy for 3 years now. It has been pretty beat up by the kids and has held together well. Not many toys do that. It’s one of the toys my kids play with almost every day. We bought this as a gift to give to a niece. Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this one - buy from reputable source at store. This one does not come with the thermometer and is a different product then pictured. Very sad toddler who was expecting the "temperature" in it. You also don't find out it's missing till the product is entirely opened and no longer returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr M.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers have mentioned, the lid is difficult to open and close. It will require a parent's help for the first little while until it loosens up. Also, the pieces themselves are slightly on the small side. Not quite doll-size, but smaller than the standard 7-8 year old. The stethoscope has an electronic talking function, which the children love. I would say this is a perfect gift for a preschooler, but the lid is not easy. My older girls love it, however, and they don't mind the lid. Also, they are on the skinny side, so the pieces fit nicely. I would recommend it for the preschooler who loves Doc McStuffins and is not easily frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Mac

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because it makes noise and lights up. Unfortunately when my daughter opened it for her birthday, the back of the stethoscope Was melted together and my husband had to break it open in able to add batteries and it wouldn’t work after. Very disappointing to my little one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: difficult case for young kids, but just like the one on the show in every other way
customer_reviews.text: has a little to much glitter that comes off, the lid on the doctor bad is annoying, but way better than the other two i bought and returned that were different. my daughter loves them and keeps trying to give all of her stuffed animals checkups.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it, but it had issues
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loved this, but it has only been a month since we purchased it, and it's already broken. sigh. 1. it is hard for little ones to open the bag. it gets stuck 2. the plastic clasp that keeps it closed broke right off. now the bag won't stay closed 3. when the bag is open, it falls backwards. the weight balance is off. 4. the bag fits all the items just right. if your kid is like mine and wants to add any extras, it won't work. with all that said, she enjoyed it
customer_reviews.author: SSE

customer_reviews.title: Felt jipped on the 7 included items, items included were not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with thermometer, but instead came with a tiny sheet of stickers. (Please view photo to see what is actually in package)
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Pretend play
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yrs old is really into pretend play and always asks the doctors to check her stuffed animal too. So we decided to get her this and she loves it! I even use it on her when she gets a booboo.
customer_reviews.author: Shme

customer_reviews.title: TOXIC plastic smell
customer_reviews.text: I've had this item open out of the package for 2 days and the smell of the plastic from the doctor case is still AWFUL. My daughter has plenty of other plastic toys but not one that smells like this. It's nauseating to be within 3 feet of it. Unfortunately due to covid, I tossed the packaging before I even brought the toy into my home. Otherwise I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy
customer_reviews.text: This is our second purchase. The original was purchased like 6 years ago and was one of the favorite toys but the pieces, slowly got lost or broken. My youngest just got it and it kept her entertained for hours!
customer_reviews.author: JulFri17

customer_reviews.title: Happy baby
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so excited she danced when we gave it to her! She loves doc Mcstuffins. Nice size, not too small. Seems decent quality, well worth the money to see her dance
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Janelle

customer_reviews.title: So hard for little ones to open!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this, but unfortunately she can't open by herself. And was disappointed that it was missing the oral thermometer. Definitely not as advertised. I should have read the reviews first :-(
customer_reviews.author: BarbaraL

customer_reviews.title: Hard for little hands to open.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is a great value. Didn't get a 5 because the clasp to open and close the purse is is very difficult, (especially for little hands) to open and close, also the purse is hard plastic and the opening is small so it makes getting toys in an out of it a bit weird.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bag doesn't open
customer_reviews.text: The one thing I would like potential buyers to know.... The bag DOES NOT open. How well can a child play dr. when she has to carry all of her supplies?! If the bag isn't useful, don't include it and lower the price.
customer_reviews.author: marsh

customer_reviews.title: Useless Doctor Bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag doesn't open! What's the point of giving kids all several little toys with a bag that they can't put them in? Why give them the bag in the first place? The doctor bag is absolutely worthless. I wouldn't have purchased this if I'd known.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Learning toy
customer_reviews.text: All the pieces are well made and have held up great for months! I use these with clients to prepare for going to the doctor and they love it! The only complaint is the stickers were not sticky and fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Manning

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Doc McStuffins fans!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my 2 1/2 year old grandson who loves Doc McStuffins. He spent a lot of Christmas Day and the day after playing with it, checking out our ears and giving us ‘shots’ .
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Head

customer_reviews.title: Cute and a big hit with Doc fans
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter is a Doc fanatic, so this was a no-brainer as a Christmas present. She loves it, especially the stethoscope and blood pressure cuff. She has been giving all of her dolls and toys "checkups" for over a week and the stethoscope has barely left her neck since Christmas morning. Overall, it is well made. The bandage bracelet that came with it is very small and barely fits my 18 month daughter, and the bag was a little hard to open at first, but other than that I have no complaints and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Miller

customer_reviews.title: different product
customer_reviews.text: indicates toy bought 8 pieces: indicates toy bought 8 pieces: Features Doc's bag, play thermometer, syringe, blood pressure cuff, horoscope, bandage cuff, sticker sheet and Doc's magical stethoscope and closed and only in front with plastic box, the product has reached me different pieces, does not have the thermometer and packaging it is also not the same,
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Suarez Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Bag is difficult to open.
customer_reviews.text: For quite a while my granddaughter couldn't even open the bag without help. Now every once in a while she can get it open. It's a strange latch for a child's toy. The opening is too small and it's somewhat difficult to get the items in and out. The instruments themselves don't seem very interactive and some not very sturdy either. All in all I felt like the Doctor's Bag was a little expensive for what it offered. My granddaughter does play with it, but gets frustrated with some of the items not working as she thinks they should...particularly the bag latch.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: All the instruments seem to work just as well as one I've seen before (it's not like the cheaper ones I've seen)
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give it a 4.5. All the instruments seem to work just as well as one I've seen before (it's not like the cheaper ones I've seen), except on the instrument that takes the blood pressure (I don't know the name) the part you sqeeze with your hand feels like a thinner plastic than I remember the other set having, and I hope it won't break. But other than that, I'm very pleased with the instruments. And the stethoscope makes sound effects.
customer_reviews.author: Miss_B

customer_reviews.title: Cute doctor set
customer_reviews.text: Mine was missing the thermometer shown in the picture, otherwise it’s a cute set and my daughter enjoys it. The carrying case is difficult for a child to open alone.
customer_reviews.author: M.W.R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It's absolutely so cute and sturdy! My daughter has been checking vitals on all her stuffed animals! She loves this kit, especially the fact that it comes with a doctor bag!
customer_reviews.author: Bea Malik

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is cute but a little on the cheap side for how it is made. My granddaughter has trouble opening the bag herself because you need to hold the bag with two hands and press up to get the handle opened. Also the opening is very small for getting your hands inside to remove doctor tools. It did not come with a thermometer which disappointed my granddaughter a little. Despite these downfalls my granddaughter still plays with it a lot. I still wish it was made better. Guess it is a tossup as to buy or not.
customer_reviews.author: Kaberube

customer_reviews.title: I personally think it is great for little ones.
customer_reviews.text: I don`t know why they had disappointing reviews. I was a little concerned after reading them but my 2 and a half yr old daughter loves mcstuffins so I ordered anyway. She loves loves loves it! We didn't have problem with the lid of the bag. It is a little stiff to open for little ones maybe but it definitely closes and it can be hard to put all in the bag by themselves but so far my little one doesn't want to put in anyway so lucky for me =) It is reasonably priced i believe and reasonably durable I'd say too. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES Doc McStuffins, so when she got her own doctor kit she was excited! She walks around the house with them all the time and loves playing doctor. I would recommend this kit to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what the picture or description is
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this set. Just annoying that we didn't get everything that is pictured. No thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: luke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect doctor set for toddler
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for our budding doctor. Now we are all getting checkups from the cutest doctor in town. The glitter is a nice touch, and the best part about it is it doesn’t flake off and get everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old wanted one but I didn't want to spend a ton of $. This was a good deal & a nicer updated one than I expected. Can't wait for her to play with it
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: No thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I literally bought this for the thermometer because a dog ate ours. Kit comes with no thermometer and a quarter sheet of stickers as the 7th item. Very disappointing and misleading.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Not made well!
customer_reviews.text: The top of the bag popped off a week after getting it. I would not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: The Doc is In!
customer_reviews.text: My oldest has been wanting a Doc McStuffins bag for months now. She was finally able to pick out and buy her own with her birthday money from Great Grandma and we couldn't be happier with it. Very sturdy, functional, and realistic
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Tam

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old little girl loves Doc McStuffins and was using a necklace as a stethoscope giving checkups to anyone and everyone. I bought her a cheapie Dr. Kit at the dollar store and the pieces fell apart almost immediately. I bought her this set and it's a huge hit! Besides the fact that it's absolutely adorable the pieces seem to be very durable....it's standing up to not only my 2 year old but also my 3 year old boy who is very rough on toys. I would buy this again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: SPeery

customer_reviews.title: Great quality great value
customer_reviews.text: I saved a lot of money purchasing this instead of purchasing yet in a brick and mortar my grand daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: FLOWERS

customer_reviews.title: Doc McStuffins doc bag & tools
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for my kid. He is 3 years old and had to overcome the opening process as it is kind of stuck (which is good that it does not open on its own). Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jsuniii

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: Cute and high quality but the lid is hard for my 4 year old to open by herself which makes it less than ideal. Otherwise it is a great set.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Stlyish
customer_reviews.text: I bought it on a deal and got for 6.5$. The box is little small to store all the sets and falls off easily. The glitter also sticks to your hand.
customer_reviews.author: tejas

customer_reviews.title: No thermometer included
customer_reviews.text: This is false advertising. They don’t include a thermometer so the picture should be changed so people don’t think they’re actually getting something decent.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Served the purpose for which we bought it but the bag is very hard to open.
customer_reviews.text: My 2-year old daughter absolutely enjoys playing with this toy. It's also helped with doctor's visit. The main reason we bought this is to help her get over her fear of going to the doctor, which works! Since buying this product and playing doctor with her, we've already been the doctor twice and she no longer screamed bloody murder at the nurses and doctors. CON: Bag is very very very very hard to open. No, really, the bag's latch design is very bad!
customer_reviews.author: Water&#39;s Wdge

customer_reviews.title: Average product inside
customer_reviews.text: Good present for my 3 year old who loves doc since she's on all of her diapers but it's lacking some detail and would have liked more product options
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Yes it is exactly what you see and if your buying for the Doc Mcstuffins element your little one will be happy to have it. But, 2 big issues with this toy. For starters the plastic doctor bag snaps closed so tightly that an adult ALWAYS has to open it. You have to squeeze the heck out of the lip to get it to reopen, and secondly, cramming the stuff back into it and getting it to close without pieces getting in the way is also a pain. Wouldn't necessarily have purchased if I had seen it before hand.
customer_reviews.author: Leeanne McQuestion

customer_reviews.title: Poor ba
customer_reviews.text: The items inside are fine but the plastic dr bag does not easily open. We almost broke ours just trying to figure it out. Get the white one the design is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my daughter for christmas, and she loved it--she's a big Doc McStuffins fan. I received all parts as advertised, we're very pleased with the product!
customer_reviews.author: happygal

customer_reviews.title: Cute kit, dislike the bag
customer_reviews.text: Cute doctor kit and my almost 3 year old daughter loves it and has played with it constantly the two days she has had it. All of the kit fits inside the bag, but the bag is an extremely hard, cheap plastic and is very loud when hit against things. I also hear, "Mommy, I need help!" several times a day because my daughter cannot open the bag on her own. Happy to help, but it should be easier for the younger ones to open it. My daughter is happy though which is what matters most.
customer_reviews.author: JMP1002

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT doctor kit!
customer_reviews.text: Pair this with a doctor coat and you have yourself the PERFECT doctor gift! It was great value for the money spent! and perfect for those Doc McStuffins fans!
customer_reviews.author: JessieJessJess

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: 3 year old loves this toy! She recieved it for Christmas and still loves it even in March.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg lees

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My friend’s d4 years old daughter was so excited when I gave her this as a present that she decided to become a doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Sima Gorokhovsky

customer_reviews.title: 3 yr old loves but hard to open and close but eventually loosens up
customer_reviews.text: 3 yr old loves but hard to open and close but eventually loosens up
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey H.

customer_reviews.title: damaged stethoscope
customer_reviews.text: great toy, but stethoscope did not work. it turned on after battery was replaced (extra trip to store for special battery), then stethoscope could not be turned off, so by morning it was dead again. very disappointed esp since our daughter loves doc mcstuffins and would have really liked the magical stethoscope to work. guess it will leave more to her imagination. hassle to return it, so we didn't, but I feel like some of the toys we get on Amazon must be seconds or fail inspections as we have had similar issues before and just didnt' bother with the hassle to return
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Fun pretend time
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Doc McStuffins and bought this to help him take care of his toys. He uses it often and it’s awesome to see his little imagination in use and him compassionate.
customer_reviews.author: Kat L

customer_reviews.title: Missing toy
customer_reviews.text: Missing the toy thermometer and Purse hard to open. Kids still love it though.
customer_reviews.author: Manar

customer_reviews.title: Nice but frustrating for 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loved it, but cannot open it by herself. She likes the tools, but the carrier has frustrated her emerging independence.
customer_reviews.author: marinarasauce123

customer_reviews.title: If I could turn back time, I wouldn’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: So my daughter absolutely loves this kit, and used it everyday. But in less then two months two pieces have already broken and we never received a thermometer with ours.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Daughter LOVED IT!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Just Play Doc McStuffin's Doctors Bag for my 3 year old daughter who loves Doc McStuffins. This handy little doctor kit is just what the Doctor ordered! The pieces are made with quality materials and I do believe it will hold up for quite some time. The stickers were an added bonus which she used to put in her Big Book of BooBoo's (not included) that I purchased elsewhere. This kit is perfect for any Doc McStuffins Fan!
customer_reviews.author: So Simply Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Has a VERY strong chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: The product looks the same as the photos. However, it has a very strong chemical odor. It’s been about ten days that we opened it. I have tried everything to get the smell off but nothing is working. It’s so bad that when I hold the you my hands start to smell like it.
customer_reviews.author: Tatev

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little pretend Doctors
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter loves playing Doctor and this was the perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely set, easily breakable for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My kids were super excited about this doctor toy, it’s a lovely set except not the best quality. After my 3 yr old and 1 1/2 yr old were playing with it for about a day some of the items already broke....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor lid design
customer_reviews.text: The items inside the bag were great and seemed like they would last/hold up to child's play well. The bag, however, was another story. It didn't open well at all and soon came off the plastic "hinges" it was on. The lid went back on, but came off easily because the bag doesn't open all the way as one would expect a child's toy to. It's sparkly and our granddaughter loved it, but the durability of the bag, in everyone's opinion, is questionable. We thought the design of the lid was very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: Doc McStuffins Doctor Bag
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for my Granddaughter who watches Doc McStuffins cartoon - she loves this doctor bag and plays with it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly  L. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My 2 years old daughter love it!! The little case is beautiful and the doctor tools are great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea. Could have been made a little better.
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love Doc Mc Stuffins. Cute set. Bag comes apart to easily. Not a great value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this bday gift. She turned 3 and takes it everywhere
customer_reviews.author: CARMEN

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and certain to break soon...
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with this - so cheap and nasty. Took about 5 mins for us to figure out how to open. The handle rotates backwards to open but the construction of the case is so poor that the plastic hinge part pops out each time and needs to be carefully refixed. Destined to be broken on Day 1 by the kids on Christmas day. The handle of the case and of some of the "instruments" is glitter covered. The glitter comes off on your hands, the sofa, everything. Not nice for Amazon. More like pirate disney toy.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars because the included set is adorable and my daughter LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because the included set is adorable and my daughter LOVES it. I have to dock one star because the case it comes with is terrible. I bought a doc mcstuffins lunch bag from target to keep the pieces in, and that has worked out great. I threw out the case as it's useless- too small and the lid pops off every two seconds.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Not a gift worthy toy.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst toys I have bought my granddaughter. The top of the Dr. bag comes apart whenever it is opened. My granddaughter has a lot of trouble opening the Dr. bag by herself, the blood pressure cuff bulb stays deflated when it is squeezed, the plastic bandaid does not stay on, and the stethoscope will not stay on her neck, but continually falls off. This is not a toy I would give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: KMH

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised when it was delivered because I didn’t realize it was glittered. What an awesome surprise, now we can tell her set and her best friend’s apart. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia F

customer_reviews.title: My 4yr olds Favorite Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: well. I can say the whole family has had a check up and we are all in good health. My daughter loves her pretend play set. I even found the Dr. coat to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alysha daniels

customer_reviews.title: Just fine
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty good gift fir small kids,but the item are not exactly the same as pictures shows.
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this gift. The only downside is that the bag is very bulky.
customer_reviews.author: D. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: The case the instruments were in broke on the opening piece Other than that great
customer_reviews.author: Terri Pavatte

customer_reviews.title: Cute set for any Doc McStuffins fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few years ago for my then 4 year old daughter. She loved it. It's a cute set and we use it a lot for pretend play. My now 4 year old twin boys play with it also. It has held up pretty well. The only issue I had was that it came in a plastic bag in an Amazon box, not in the cool box that I've seen in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: BrandyW

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter on her second birthday... She loved it so much when she opened it she was done and didn’t care about any of the rest of her gifts! Very nice,
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: As described. Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter. She loves it. Good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Should be ZERO stars!!! False advertising - product description is not what I recieved. Very disappointed when my daughter opened this on Christmas morning. I was expecting to receive other item but only had stethoscope, needle and band-aid. I wish I would have opened the package earlier so I could have returned it. Since my daughter is only 3 she doesn't know any different. I will never buy from this manufacuture again and will not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Its a fun toy for my little girl. She enjoys playing with it and loves to pretend shes a doctor. So it is a good educational toy for her to be playing with. If she loves it, then I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Darelle

customer_reviews.title: Everything is great, except the bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag is difficult to open, and difficult to put things inside. Otherwise, cute set.
customer_reviews.author: CP

product_meta.title: Disney Doc McStuffins Original Doctor’s Bag- Exclusive
product_meta.description:
Your stuffed animals and toy friends are ready for their check-ups! Disney Junior's Doc McStuffins Doctor's Bag Set includes a new and improved Doctor's bag, sparkly syringe, blood pressure cuff with working gauge and glitter vinyl cuff, glittery otoscope, bandage cuff bracelet, and a bandage box that dispenses colorful bandage stickers! Of course, Doc's magical stethoscope is included featuring sounds and light-up. Now your little Doc can "practice" her skills and nurture her favorite toys back to perfect health. Requires 3 AG13 batteries. ​

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Your stuffed animals and toys have never been more excited to get their check up's. Now your little Doc can "practice" her skills and nurture her favorite toys back to perfect health.
feature_bullets: Doc McStuffin's Bag Set includes 8 glittery and sparkly pieces
Features Doc's bag, play thermometer, syringe, blood pressure cuff, horoscope, bandage cuff, sticker sheet and Doc's magical stethoscope
The set includes a light up stethoscope

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,119 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
